The process for re-adding a server isomg tje delta node recovery method involves:
Fail over the node using either the graceful or hard failover method. Graceful failover is recommended.
After the node is failed over, specify whether delta or full recovery is to be used.
During the next rebalance, the node is added back to the cluster using the specified recovery method.
To use delta recovery during failover, recovery, and rebalance operations:

step.info: The failed server node is re-added to the cluster.
